executiveSummary: Cynthia and John David, founders of Life Raft Treats, pitched their novelty ice cream brand on Shark Tank, seeking $250,000 for 5% equity. Their hero product, 'Not Fried Chicken,' is an ice cream dessert shaped like fried chicken, which impressed the Sharks but ultimately did not secure an investment.

actionItems.task: Take direct-to-consumer (DTC) sales in-house and revamp the company website to manage online sales directly
Continue growing retail distribution beyond the current 500 stores

nextSteps: Life Raft Treats will continue expanding retail presence and develop in-house DTC capabilities to reduce reliance on third-party partners after leaving the Shark Tank without a deal.
